title: I thought I knew but I was wrong: New Video Art from Australia
brief_description: I thought I knew but I was wrong: New Video Art From Australia is a proposed collaboration between ACMI and Asialink to tour an exhibition of contemporary Australian video art to selected venues throughout Asia in late 2004- early 2005. The exhibition will be curated by Alexie Glass, ACMI and Sarah Tutton, Asialink, and will include the work of a range of artists and filmmakers.
